title: Dear Riot, Please read, pickpocket twitch seems to be on the move
body:
dear riot,

A few days ago while i was walking along the streets of demacia with my newly bought bundle, Pickpocket Twitch suddenly snatched some of my RP!

I travelled to the league in hopes of them helping me but they only said i should be more careful!. I was furious, but when i was cursing myself, Phreak, the one and only,  came and told me that i should ask you, the Rito people for help! So here i am, having travelled the shuriman deserts, in need of your help, can you please help and send me this 27 RP i need?

Kind regards also to azir who helped me tame a Xer'Sai that i used as a transport through the dangerous domain of Rek'Sai

From one of the leagues daring summoners - GalaxyGladious

replies.body: Man. This issue has got me {{champion:29}} ing.
That Pickpocket Twitch is a menace. Just the other day I was in Bandle City and he picked my pockets clean. I lost all my IP **and **RP. I demand justice!
wow the way u wrote that, as if ur a real summoner. fking nerd
You need to write a story for extra IP or Rp.
